SALT LEVEL Salt Level %1$s%% CURRENT Low Salt Levels SALT TYPE Order More What type of salt should I use? Recommended salt types are nugget, pellet, or coarse solar salts with less than 1% impurities. If your water softener has run out of softening capacity and needs a immediate recharge, you can press the "'"recharge now"'" button to begin this immediately. This is not necessary under normal working conditions. What time would you like your water softener to automatically recharge? The device will only recharge when it needs to, so this likely occurs periodically and not every day. The recharge is required to restore your water softener"'"s capacity to produce soft water. This should ideally be done at a time when you"'"re not likely to be using any water. ARE YOU SURE? While your water softener is recharging you still have water in your home, but it maybe hard water until the unit has finished regenerating. The charge will take approximately two hours. CONTINUE CANCEL ALREADY RECHARGING Check your water softener detail page to see how much time is left remaining until the recharge is complete. WATER SOFTENER
Your water hardness level is defaulted to <device default value> gpg (grains per gallon). This should vary by location and water source. To edit water hardness, please refer to the owner"'"s manual and update the setting on the device itself. To determine your water hardness level, you can call your municipality if you use city water or purchase a water test kit.

Manage your irrigation schedule with ease using irrigation devices that "Work with Arcus". Turn on the schedule by selecting the checkmark. Uncheck to deactivate the schedule. Create an event by choosing your start time, zones, and watering duration. Save water and money by reducing your watering time by a percentage for the entire schedule.

e.g. If every event in the schedule is set to 10 min/zone during the summer, you may want to set Water Saver to 50% in the fall, which will reduce watering to 5 min/zone. SKIP IRRIGATION FOR START TIME Watering in the early morning or early evening is recommended. ZONE ZONES Select the zones and watering duration for this event. Tap Edit to select the zones and watering duration for this event. To water the same zone multiple times a day, you'll need to create additional events. REPEAT ON EVENT Create an event by choosing your start time, zones, and watering duration. OVERLAPPING EVENTS You currently have an event scheduled that overlaps with the start time you have chosen.  BLIND TYPE CHANNEL ON CONTROLLER TILT RAISE/LOWER Remove Somfy Roller Blinds Remove Somfy Tilt Blinds Remove Blinds It's best if the device is within 10 feet of the
hub. 1. Use the arrow keys on the controller to find
Z-WAVE OPTIONS and select it using the
center button.
2. Use the arrows to find VIRTUAL NODE and
select it using the center button.

2.	Simultaneously press and hold the up and down button on the remote until the shade jogs.

3.	Adjust the blind to the desired Open/Up position.

4.	Press and hold “MY” on the remote until the shade jogs. Configure Closed/Down Position 1.	Close the blind completely.

2.	Simultaneously press and hold the up and down button on the remote until the
shade jogs.

thermostat. Manage and control thermostats, fans, vents and temperature-reading devices
throughout your home. Scheduling Schedules are managed under the Schedule
tab. For thermostats, Arcus has created an
energy efficient schedule. You can choose to
activate or customize the schedule. Temperature Any device that can report temperature
and humidity to Arcus will appear under
the Temperature tab. More Tap the MORE tab to select the
temperature and humidity that you'd
like to see on your Dashboard.

when something happens. Rules are easy to create Add a rule by tapping the '+'
sign on the dashboard. Rules are Easy to Customize Tap the underlined word
to build the Rule. Rules Work When You
Want Them To You can schedule Rules to be active
at certain times of the day. All Your Rules in One Place Manage and edit existing Rules in the
left hand navigation.

together.

adjust the thermostat and lock your doors. Scenes Can be Triggered in

Without this permission, Arcus will not work. <b>Location Permission</b><br>Location is used to retrieve information such as timezone, daylight savings time, etc so your scheduled events will run correctly. <b>Location Permission</b><br>To search for your Wi-Fi network, Android requires the Location permission to be turned on. <b>Location Permission</b><br>To search for your Bluetooth devices, Android requires the Location permission to be turned on.
